game.name: Connect The Gems
game.description:
Connect The Gams is an awesome and brand new arcade game where you have to connect gems of the same color. Put your brain and matching abilities to the test to complete all 36 unique and challenging levels! There are many tricky match-3 puzzle sets to experience. Check out the required colors and get ready to connect more of it in the game field! Feel free to tap on the pause button in case if you need a break! Unpause to tap on it and enter the wonderful fun again! Keep practicing to become the master of this match 3 brain game!  

When you click the play button, you would be welcomed by the cute owls. After that, they will explain some basic rules of the game. Over the screen, you would find a plenty of colored gems. Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to connect games of the same color. Make sure that each connected line should be at least 3 gems long in this html5 puzzle game. Put your finger on your mouse or on the screen of your mobile phone and start connecting gems by dragging or tapping a line between them! All the same colored games will be removed then.

You can match 3 or more same colored gems and matching more than 3 gems will reward you with some more points. Be careful and try to connect as many gems as you can before all your moves are finished! Look at the bottom of the screen to find out a line which will show how many points you have scored as of now! Earn more points to get more stars in this mobile phone puzzle challenge! Complete the required amount of gems that you see at the top of the screen to clear each level!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK AND SWIPE TO CONNECT THE SAME JEMS
